content:
The current app allows muting an un-subscribed stream topic. adding an unsubscribed stream topic to the muted list is just a useless thing. from PR - https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/15174, @Steve Howell pointed out that a user may mute some noisy topic first, then he may subscribe.
What can be done here ??
My observation here is open for debate. I stand by what I said, but I donâ€™t feel super strongly about it.
